Authentication.swapMacaroonPath: <Complete path of the folder containing Loop's loop.macaroon for the node>
Authentication.boltzMacaroonPath: <Complete path of the folder containing Boltz admin.macaroon for the node>
Authentication.lnApiPassword: <Optional:Can be used to provide password in ECL implementation>

Settings.swapServerUrl: <url for swap server REST APIs for the node. e.g. https://localhost:8081>
Settings.boltzServerUrl: <url for boltz server REST APIs for the node. e.g. https://localhost:9003>
